archimate:Requirement.name: AS.1.1.10a: a) gathering relevant metrics, typically associated with numbers (e.g. totals, percentages, ratios and volume), time (e.g. duration, real time vs. snapshot and frequency) and cost (e.g. based on severity and impact of security incidents)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
